name: Skill Book: Gun
description:
A well-used pistol with a sticky note attached to the business end of it. The note reads "This end away from face."
...Okay, there's a booklet on safety and discipline, too. Read to learn how to use Gun.
useDescription: After picking up the gun and pointing it away from your face (and reading the booklet), you are able to fire a gun. You can make use of this.
